nodes.text: During the Age of the Empire, the planet Jelucan had a school that prepared Jelucani youths for the Imperial Academy, a network of military academies that supplied officers and soldiers to the Galactic Empire. The school had several preparatory programs including Endurance and Agility and various obstacle courses. Jelucan had a preparatory academy because the Empire limited recruitment from former Separatist worlds like Jelucan.

The school was headed by a proctor and the academy staff personally handpicked the students. Due to the limited slots, competition was fierce and the academy's coaches were known to disqualify students who suffered physical injuries during training. Two known students were Thane Kyrell and Ciena Ree, who later became Imperial cadets at the Royal Imperial Academy on Coruscant.
